trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKYR101_04170_GRIGGE_000_000<tab>Hmm... You strike me as someone who isn't afraid to get <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> hands dirty─and I don't mean that as a euphemism. Are you interested in a bit of good old-fashioned hard work?

TEXT_AKTKYR101_04170_GRIGGE_000_001<tab>...But perhaps I'm getting ahead of myself. I am Grigge, one of Sharlayan's gleaners. It is our role to procure materials, samples, knowledge─all you can imagine, and more.

TEXT_AKTKYR101_04170_GRIGGE_000_002<tab>Naturally, 'twould be difficult for any one person to comb the world each time our countrymen ask something of us. Thus did we form a guildship, the better to share information and see the requests we receive to the hands of those best suited to fulfilling them.

TEXT_AKTKYR101_04170_GRIGGE_000_003<tab>Some requests, for instance, are better assigned to those who demonstrate a certain degree of finesse and persistence...and the calluses upon your hands tell me that you are one such person.

TEXT_AKTKYR101_04170_GRIGGE_000_004<tab>I understand that you may feel some trepidation, given the...er, somewhat lax selection process. As you like as not suspect, the Forum would never officially recognize a traveler from another nation as a gleaner.

TEXT_AKTKYR101_04170_GRIGGE_000_005<tab>...Unofficially, however, we're up to our necks in requests as of late, and they're coming in faster than ever before. We'll take any talent we can get─and pay good coin for it─so please, tell me you're interested!
TEXT_AKTKYR101_04170_SYSTEM_000_006<tab>You may now undertake gleaner leves by speaking with Grigge.
TEXT_AKTKYR101_04170_GRIGGE_000_010<tab>Sharlayan or no, we are in dire need of skilled help right now...
TEXT_AKTKYR101_04170_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>In order to undertake this quest, you must be a Disciple of the Hand or the Land of level 80 or above.
